import { useState } from 'react' import Card from '../ui/Card' import styles from './Register.module.css' const Register = () => { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({}) const InputChangeHandler = ({ target }) => { const { value, name } = target setCredentials({ ...credentials, [name]: value, }) } const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { first_name: name, last_name, email } = credentials console.log(credentials, name, last_name, email) setCredentials({}) } return (
) } export default Register
